content: around next st chain-3 skip next 2 st fpsc around next st chain-3 skip next 2 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 24 fpsc 24 chain-3 r10 medium work behind r9 entirely into r8 all the stitches you work into in this round already have an fpsc around them single_crochet in top of treble_crochet skip next 2 st 6 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 st *single_crochet in next st skip next 2 st 6 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 st** repeat from * to ** all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn place a stitch marker in each of the four scs worked into a treble as shown 72 double_crochet 12 single_crochet 6 r11 dark begin in first shell beyond any marked st don t remove stitch markers *single_crochet in gap in centre of 6 double_crochet shell chain-3 skip next 3 st fpdc around next st the single_crochet chain-3 skip next 3 st ** repeat from * to ** all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 12 single_crochet 12 fpdc 24 chain-3 now you can define the corners r12 light work behind r11 entirely into r10 double_crochet in first st of 6 double_crochet shell immediately after marked st 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st partially hidden - beyond the single_crochet in centre of shell 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st skip next st the single_crochet half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st partially hidden - beyond the single_crochet in centre of shell 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st skip next st the single_crochet double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st partially hidden - beyond the single_crochet in centre of shell 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st skip next marked st chain-1 these chain spaces form the corners of the square repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn remove stitch markers 64 double_crochet 32 half_double_crochet 4 chain-1 7 r13 medium begin in any chain space 4 treble_crochet chain-2 4 treble_crochet in corner chain space skip next 3 st including hidden st double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 3 st single_crochet in next 5 st skip next st single_crochet in next 5 st half_double_crochet in next 3 st double_crochet in next st skip next 2 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch in 2nd st and cut yarn 32 treble_crochet 8 double_crochet 24 half_double_crochet 40 single_crochet 4 chain-2 r14 dark 2 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in corner chain space bpdc around next 26 st repeat from beginning all around fasten_off invisibly or join with a slip_stitch
